LanguageData.AS_WHE_Race.label: half elf
LanguageData.AS_WHE_Race.description: Half-Elves are a race created using the technology of the Glitter World, combining the characteristics of humans and elves. \n Living on a remote planet where they could not originally exist, these half-elves are thought to have been illegally traded among the Space Race and then crash-landed and settled on a remote planet due to spacecraft problems. \n shooting, hunting, cultivating, and cooking in general, and they have good survival skills, but they are closed off and quite mechanically deaf. Translated with www.DeepL.com/Translator (free version)
LanguageData.AS_WHE_Race.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.AS_WHE_Race.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.AS_WHE_Race.tools.2.label: teeth
LanguageData.AS_WHE_Race.tools.3.label: head
